document_title: Varicose veins of the lower extremities: Causes, symptoms and treatment
subsection_name: suy-gian-tinh-mach-sau-chi-duoi.json_4_Diagnosis of deep varicose veins of the lower limbs
subsection_content:
Determining the diagnosis is mainly based on clinical examination including seeing dilated and tortuous veins, skin discoloration, nutritional disorders, ulcers and the appearance of hemangiomas.
Finally, the diagnosis is determined by color Doppler vascular ultrasound, with this method allowing us to determine hemodynamic disorders, the condition of the venous valves, the degree of vein dilation and other complications. embolism in the vessel so that you can have the right treatment attitude.
